name: GHU Game Jam Submission: Arctic Trove
name_original: GHU Game Jam Submission: Arctic Trove
description:
GHU Game Jam Submission: Arctic Trove is an action game developed by Alinder. It came out on 13-02-2022.
GHU Game Jam Submission: Arctic Trove is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
